text:
[Verse]
Road lights flashing by
City skies so high
Wanna reach the moon
Let the nights never die

[Verse 2]
Dancing through the night
Stars shining so bright
Chasing neon dreams
Till the morning light

[Chorus]
Dreaming in neon
All the colors glow
We’re unstoppable
Let the rhythm flow

[Verse 3]
Hearts beating in sync
With every wink and blink
Feel the music rise
In this electric pink

[Bridge]
Lost in the sound
Feet off the ground
In this neon haze
We’ll never come down

[Chorus]
Dreaming in neon
All the colors glow
We’re unstoppable
Let the rhythm flow
title: Dreaming in Neon
